item.title: Form表单如何在提交时只显示一项错误项
item.description: let form = this.$refs["ruleForm"]; form.validate(async (valid,fields) => { try { if(!this.validateConfirmPass()) { throw new Error("两次密码输入不一致"); } if (valid) { await myPurse.updateTransactionPassword(this.ruleForm); this.$successMessage("设置成功"); } else { // 清楚不要的检测字段 let fieldsArr = Object.keys(fields); let props = fieldsArr.slice(1); form.clearValidate(props) let formEl = form.$el; setTimeout(() => { let FirstInputEl = formEl .querySelector( ".is-error input[type='text'],.is-error input[type='password'],is-required input[type='text'],.is-required input[type='password']" ); // 使第一个input聚焦 FirstInputEl.focus(); FirstInputEl.scrollIntoViewIfNeeded?FirstInputEl.scrollIntoViewIfNeeded():FirstInputEl.scrollIntoView(); }, 0); throw new Error("请修改不合法字段"); } } catch (e) { this.$errorMessage(e.message); } });
